content:
Sweden has allocated 120 million crowns ($ 11.3 million) to help the Gaza, Ukraine and Sudan sector through the UN Food Program.

About thisinformsSweden's Ministry of Assistance and Foreign Trade.

It is reported that support will be allocated immediately.120 million Swedish crownsThey will be distributed equally between the three regions.

"Sweden is a close and valuable partner of the UN Food Program, and I congratulate the government's support for our anti -crisis efforts in the Gaza, Sudan and Ukraine sector," said UN Food Program Cindy McCain.

According to her, these funds will help reduce hunger in countries and save people's lives.

Recall Ukraine and SwedenPreparestart negotiations on a security agreement.

As reportedArmyinform, Ukraine will receive € 100 million from the Council of Europe Development Bank, and the funds will also be used for housing certificates for UBD.
title: Sweden has announced the transfer of humanitarian aid to Ukraine
description: This was reported by the press service of the Ministry of Assistance and Foreign Trade of Sweden. ...
author: Army Inform
